text:
You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies I and H, and Blue Mountain has genies S and V.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet L generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet U generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 212 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies T and M, and Blue Mountain has genies X and U.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet S generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet K generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies F and S, and Blue Mountain has genies L and O.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet V generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet Q generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies G and P, and Blue Mountain has genies N and B. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet A generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet R generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies E and G, and Blue Mountain has genies C and H.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet S generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet V generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 202 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies I and F, and Blue Mountain has genies K and R.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet J generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet N generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies V and Z, and Blue Mountain has genies E and Y. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet P generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet C generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies K and F, and Blue Mountain has genies M and U.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet I generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet B generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 202 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies I and X, and Blue Mountain has genies H and C.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet Y generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet N generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies J and V, and Blue Mountain has genies G and F.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet C generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet D generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 204 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies X and C, and Blue Mountain has genies I and Q.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet B generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet V generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies X and M, and Blue Mountain has genies T and F.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet A generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet S generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 203 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies W and M, and Blue Mountain has genies R and K. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet G generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet P generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies M and R, and Blue Mountain has genies N and X.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet J generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet I generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies S and D, and Blue Mountain has genies Q and H.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet Y generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet K generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 202 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies C and B, and Blue Mountain has genies D and R.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet J generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet L generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 272 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies A and C, and Blue Mountain has genies O and H. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet P generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet I generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies Z and J, and Blue Mountain has genies X and U.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet E generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet W generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 203 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies Z and H, and Blue Mountain has genies P and J. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet X generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet B generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies H and P, and Blue Mountain has genies K and Y. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet J generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet Z generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies B and S, and Blue Mountain has genies D and H.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet F generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet L generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies G and Z, and Blue Mountain has genies N and M.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet W generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet J generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 201 days.

You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land. You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain. Pink Mountain has genies X and E, and Blue Mountain has genies R and C. Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it. When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it. If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin. Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time. To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly. Magic carpet U generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet P generally flies to Blue Mountain. However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet. In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain. You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key. You are playing the role of a musician living in a fantasy land.
You play the flute for gold coins to an audience of genies, who live inside magic lamps on Pink Mountain and Blue Mountain.
Pink Mountain has genies A and V, and Blue Mountain has genies F and Q.
Each genie lives in a lamp with the corresponding letter on it.
When you arrive on a mountain, you can pick up a lamp and rub it.
If the genie is in the mood for music, he will come out of his lamp, listen to a song, and give you a gold coin.
Each genieâ€™s interest in music changes with time.
To go to the mountains, you chose one of two magic carpets, which you purchase from a magician, who enchants them to fly.
Magic carpet X generally flies to Pink Mountain, and magic carpet L generally flies to Blue Mountain.
However, on rare occasions a strong wind blowing from that mountain makes flying there too dangerous because the wind might blow you off the carpet.
In this case, the carpet is forced to land instead on the other mountain.
You can take a magic carpet or pick up a lamp and rub it by pressing the corresponding key.
Your goal is to get as many coins as possible over the next 202 days.
